c.c: This section demonstrates the possibilities of basic text formatting.

c:
It is possible to highlight *important words*. There are _two ways_ to
accomplish this.

**Even more important words are printed in bold. For this there are also two
__different ways__.

c.c: **Even more important words are printed in bold. For this there are also two

c: Another formatting option is crossing out ~~words~~ or ~~whole phrases~~.

c.c: Another formatting option is crossing out

c:
The formatting options can of course be combined. For example, *in an important
part of a sentence you can cross out ~~words~~*.

c.c: The formatting options can of course be combined. For example,
in an important part of a sentence you can cross out

c:
If a formatting character is to be printed, it must be prefixed with a
\*Backslash\*.

c.c: If a formatting character is to be printed, it must be prefixed with a *Backslash*.
